subject: Possible TestCaseClassLoader bug
msgSnippet: I was writing a reloading console runner and had to make the following change in order to make it work. Is this a known bug? Thanks David www.testdriven.com
messageBody:
I was writing a reloading console runner and had to make the following
change in order to make it work. Is this a known bug?
Thanks
David
www.testdriven.com

public class TestCaseClassLoader extends ClassLoader {
...
public synchronized Class loadClass(String name, boolean resolve)
throws ClassNotFoundException {

//Class c= findLoadedClass(name);
//DV original code forgot to resolve here
Class c = super.loadClass(name,resolve);
if (c != null)
return c;
